member.name: IMFByteStreamCacheControl2.GetByteRanges
member.summary: Gets the ranges of bytes that are currently stored in the cache.
member.param: Receives the number of ranges returned in the ppRanges array.
Receives an array of structures. Each structure specifies a range of bytes stored in the cache. The caller must free the array by calling .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFByteStreamCacheControl2.IsBackgroundTransferActive
member.summary: Queries whether background transfer is active.
member.param: Receives the value TRUE if background transfer is currently active, or FALSE otherwise.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFByteStreamCacheControl2.SetCacheLimit
member.param: The maximum number of bytes to store in the cache, or ULONGLONG_MAX for no limit. The default value is no limit.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFByteStreamCacheControl2
member.summary: Controls how a network byte stream transfers data to a local cache. This interface extends the interface.
